pages.title: Fluid Cooling Chamber
pages.text: The <item>Fluid Cooling Chamber/$ is a crafting machine that converts liquids into items. It requires temperatures below a certain threshold.$(br2)A typical recipe takes liquid, has a maximum temperature to work, and produces an item alongside heat. There is a <item>$(l:heat/cable)cable/$ connection on the top.
Any created heat will be released at a constant rate until all the created heat has been produced.

<em>There is a handy and powerful heat generation method using this machine!/$ When cooling lava into obsidian, more heat is produced than is required to melt the obsidian back into lava in an <item>$(l:heat/crucible)Industrial Crucible/$.
This machine is typically used for, among other things, producing ice or cooling molten metals into ingots.
